Class Patient

Object
Patient
public class Patient extends Object
The Patient class represents a patient user within the Hospital Management System. It provides a menu-driven interface to allow patients to view and manage their medical records, schedule and manage appointments, and update personal information. This class interacts with multiple components such as: - DataProcessor: for reading and writing data. - PatientMedicalRecordManager: for managing patient medical records. - AppointmentSlotManager: for viewing available appointment slots. - AppointmentManager: for scheduling, rescheduling, and canceling appointments. - AppointmentOutcomeManager: for viewing past appointment outcome records. Logging of patient actions is handled through the Logger interface.
Since:
2024-11-6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Peter Loh

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String userID, String userRole, Logger logger, dataReader reader, dataWriter writer)
      Constructs a Patient instance with necessary components for accessing and managing patient records and appointments.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier of the patient user.
      userRole - the role of the user, specifically "Patient" for this class.
      logger - the logger to log actions performed by the patient.
      reader - the data reader for accessing file data.
      writer - the data writer for saving updates to file data.
